listFilesRecursive

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File> listFilesRecursive(java.io.File rootDirectory,
                                                                   java.lang.String[] extensions,
                                                                   IFileSystemScanObserver observer)
Recurse through a directory's sub-folders to produce a list of files whose extensions match the ones given in the extensions list.

Parameters:
rootDirectory - the root directory to scan
extensions - the extensions to match
observer - the observer to inform as to scan status
Returns:
the list of files found
